option.name: PARAMETERS
option.value: --include=localhost:0 --master_port 25529 run_glue.py --train_file data/glue/stsb/train.json --validation_file data/glue/stsb/validation.json --model_name_or_path google-bert/bert-base-cased --output_dir output/GLUE-STSb/google-bert/bert-base-cased --do_train --do_eval --bf16 True --tf32 True --max_seq_length 256 --per_device_eval_batch_size 4 --per_device_train_batch_size 4 --gradient_accumulation_steps 4 --learning_rate 2e-5 --num_train_epochs 10 --logging_strategy epoch --eval_strategy epoch --save_strategy no --deepspeed configs/deepspeed/ds1_t5.json --overwrite_output_dir --overwrite_cache --cache_dir .cache --eval_on_start True
